revised_title: The Role of Biology in Modern Education and its Interdisciplinary Connections
tldr: In this address, Sir Edward Salisbury emphasizes the importance of biology in modern education and its connections with other scientific disciplines. He highlights the need for a broad-based education that fosters mental humility and encourages students to understand the unity of knowledge. He also discusses the role of an ecological approach in integrating various scientific approaches and the significance of biology in addressing real-world issues, such as food supply and environmental conservation.
